Description:
Detects changes and updates to the user risk and MFA registration policy.
Attackers can modified the policies to Bypass MFA, weaken security thresholds, facilitate further attacks, maintain persistence.


Author: Harjot Singh (@cyb3rjy0t)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: User Risk and MFA Registration Policy Updated
Query: sourcetype='azure-auditlogs' eql select * from _source_ where loggedbyservice = 'aad management ux' and category = 'policy' and operationname = 'update user risk and mfa registration policy'
